original_title: Trains delayed on Kelani Valley Line due to derailment
original_body_lines: Trains operating along the Kelani Valley Line will experience delays due to a derailment near the Cotta Road Railway Station.
The Sri Lanka Railways Department confirmed that two carriages of a train plying from Colombo Fort to Avissawella had derailed near the Cotta Road Railway Station in Colombo a short while ago.
